About me

Creator and logical thinker for your web-site

Let me introduce myself. My name is Djordje Stepanovic and I am a WordPress Expert Junior. I have built many of websites and e-commerce platforms for different purposes and businesses. Also, I am into SEO and operate on improving of performances and speeds of websites and webpages. Besides that, I work on troubleshooting site issues, identyfing and resolving a problem, error or fault within your sites. Don’t hesitate to contact me for more information!

Design at it's finest

Well-designed and good-looking site is what catches the visitor attention at first sight. A successful design guides the visitor eye across the whole website as a composition. Some of the most important visual elements of design are balance, proximity, alignment, repetition and contrast.

Think about it!

Simplicity above all

If you want online shop for your business with simplicity of usage and searching of different type of products, you are on the right place. Customers love simplicity, viewing it as a form of good customer service. When e-commerce platform is simply for usage, it creates a smooth customer experience.

Think about it!

Optimization is mandatory

Beside the well-designed look and simplicity of usage, every website needs excellent performance, speed and visibility on the Internet. These things are important for visitors of websites all around the world.

Think about it!

Sometimes website is having issues

Sometimes your website break down or has some other issues, and you need a right person to solve it very quickly. Because of that, troubleshooting is an important part of managing of websites, e-commerce platforms and others.

Think about it!
